description: This file defines the root Flutter Application widget, setting up dependency injection via providers, theming, routing, and initial data loading relevant to the app. It acts as the entry point for the Flutter frontend, orchestrating various controllers, repositories, and themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Root StatefulWidget that initializes controllers, repositories, themes, and routing for the application.

classes.name: _AppState
classes.description: State class managing initialization and building of the App widget, including dependency setup.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes repositories, controllers, loads theme mode, and preloads sample list.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method that composes the widget tree, providing theming, routing, and app state.
